name: Trench Chef
description:
Keep The Pan Boiling in Trench Chef! Wander around the Heavily bombarded trench to gather ingredients for your food! Keep the cauldron full of food or the soldier will not have anything to eat!

Play this game made for the Design Den Summer Jam! Crafted in only 48 hrs!

THE THEME WAS: LOOP!

The team:

-Massimo Mezzalira Lead/Game designer

-Pontus Avén Ytterholm Game Designer

-Elias Wickander Game Programmer

-Martin Frykler Artist

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(141) Nature sounds Meditation forest sounds of birds singing relaxation - 4 minutes - YouTube
